name: Suzy and the Magic Forest (GMTK Game Jam '17)
name_original: Suzy and the Magic Forest (GMTK Game Jam '17)
description:
This game was submitted for the Game Maker's Toolkit 2017 Game Jam.

Help Suzy the witch get through the haunted forest and to her home. Her magic power depletes constantly in the forest so you'll need to find clearings to regain power from the moonlight. But beware, monsters can see you in the clearings and will swarm you if you take too long!

Resources

- Made in Unity

- Features royalty-free music from Kevin MacLeod

- Sound effects from the Adobe Audition Library

- Programming and art is by me.
